summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Product Listing Page (PLP) Next.js application completed. Tested all major features including API integration, responsive design, SEO elements, and interactive functionality across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports.

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu overlay intercepts pointer events preventing menu item clicks
ui_bugs.details: The mobile navigation opens correctly but clicking menu items is blocked by overlay pointer event interception

passed_tests: FakeStore API integration - 20 products loaded successfully
Desktop header with logo, navigation, search/wishlist/cart icons
Mobile hamburger menu toggle opens navigation panel
Hero banner with 'DISCOVER OUR PRODUCTS' H1 heading
Product grid displays all products with proper layout
Filter sidebar HIDE/SHOW toggle functionality on desktop
Sort dropdown with price high/low, recommended options
Product cards show image, title, description, price, rating
Footer newsletter signup, social links, payment methods
SEO: page title, meta description, H1/H2 tags, schema.org JSON-LD
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Product images have SEO-friendly alt text
Mobile filter button opens filter sidebar
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix mobile menu overlay pointer event interception issue in Header component. The mobile navigation opens correctly but menu items cannot be clicked due to overlay blocking pointer events.
